snippet.title: Race Drivin Super Stunt Track on Mame64
snippet.description:
Used the Logitech G25 with 900 degree wheel rotation + Stick shifter and clutch. Probably about as close as you can get to owning the arcade version.

Computer spec:

Intel Core I7 980x
8Gb Ram
Nvidia Geforce GTX480
Window 7 Ultimate
Sound Blaster Xi-Fi Fatality

For the record, Midway seriously botched the emulation of their releases of Hard Drivin and Race Drivin on their Midway Arcade Treasures compilations......
